Messages.REPLY_SERVO_OFF: Servo amplifier is in error state
Messages.REPLY_ABNORMAL_ROWID: Frame sequence error: invalid frame id in command
Messages.REPLY_EXEC_CMD_BUFFER_FULL: Commands sequence violation: controller is busy
Messages.REPLY_ERROR_POSITION: The encoder position detected on the motor enabling has differed too much from the value saved on the last disabling
Messages.REPLY_STEPS_PERIOD_LIMIT: Limits violation: Too much steps or period
Messages.REPLY_BIG_ENC_DIF: There is a gap in encoder values, joint is misaligned.
Messages.REPLY_ZMARK_ERROR: Z mark appeared in unexpected position, joint is misaligned.
Messages.REPLY_EVENT_TIMESTAMP_IN_PAST: Synchronous event timestamp was already in past when received.
Messages.REPLY_POSITION_LAG_TOO_BIG: Too big gap between target and actual positions was detected while moving.
Messages.REPLY_RESUME_WHILE_NOT_READY: Resume cmd was received while servo not in idle state or disabled.
Messages.REPLY_INCORRECT_AXIS_ID: Axis targeting command with incorrect axis id.
Messages.REPLY_POS_CONTINUITY_VIOLATION: Position continuity violation on frame start encoders.
Messages.REPLY_ABRUPT_POS_CHANGE_ON_FRAME: Too abrupt position change was detected on frame.
Messages.REPLY_CANT_HANDLE_CMD_WHILE_MOVING: Command is allowed only in static state but was received while moving.
Messages.REPLY_VEL_CONTINUITY_VIOLATION: Velocity continuity violation on frame start velocity.
Messages.REPLY_POSITIVE_LIMIT_SWITCH: Positive limit switch reached while moving.
Messages.REPLY_NEGATIVE_LIMIT_SWITCH: Negative limit switch reached while moving.
Messages.ERR_ENCDIFF_TOO_MUCH: Encoders difference is too much, cant resume track
Messages.ERR_TARGET_WAIT_TIMEOUT: Cant reach target. Exceeded positioning time.
Messages.ERR_FRAME_RESTRICTIONS: Frame restrictions are violated: duration or steps count
Messages.ERR_SAFETY_PROTOCOL_VIOLATION: Motion has been interrupted. Safety protocol violation.
Messages.ERR_INCONSISTENT_AXIS_STATES: Unacceptable combination of axis states detected.
Messages.ERR_AXIS_TIME_SYNC: Time synchronization is violated. Timestamp of one or several axis controllers differs too much from master controller time
Messages.ERR_IDLE_WITHOUT_PASSING_STOP_FRAME: Axis dropped to idle state without passing stop frame.
Messages.ERR_SWITCHED_TO_CANCEL_WITHOUT_ERRORS: Axis controller switched to cancelling state without raising any error flag.
Messages.ERR_SWITCHED_TO_PAUSE_WITHOUT_ERRORS: Axis controller switched to pausing or paused state without raising any error flag.
Messages.ERR_JOINTS_MISMATCH: Internal error, joints count mismatch between DrivesController configuration and other modules.
Messages.REPLY_COMMAND_INVALID_IN_CURRENT_STATE: Request is not allowed in current state.
Messages.JointsMismatch: Internal error, joints count mismatch between DrivesController configuration and other modules.
